taskDescription: Copy the Account details of the user to AD
Send the request to Skype Group 'Zendesk Account Creation'
Duplicate your ticket, edit and add "-Local IT Set up" on the Subject. Add the new joiner details as notes. Don't forget to paste your password
Send the request to the Teams GC
Ask HRBP if PPF Form has been submitted to People Operations mailbox. Include people.operations@swireshipping.com on the CC
Duplicate your ticket, Edit and add '- Coruson Account Creation' on the subject and assign the ticket to Jaya. Send the account details to Jaya
Duplicate your ticket, Edit and add '- K2 Account Creation' on the subject and assign the ticket to group Automation Intelligent Team. Send the account details to k2_itdigital@swiredigital.com
